app_name: Maroon 5 - Girl Like You Piano Tiles
app_detail:
This is a super fun Piano Tiles and highly addictive game suited for everyone best game 2019.
No special skills needed for Maroon 5 - Girl Like You Piano Tiles, all this game asks of you is an attentive mind and fast fingers!

It's very, very simple.

HOW TO PLAY:
Maroon 5 - Girl Like You Piano Tiles is very easy to play. Follow this rule: Tap on the black piano tiles. Don’t tap the white tiles. Hold the long piano tiles until the end of tiles.

Features:
1. Beautiful galaxy graphics and excellent sound effect with melody interesting.
2. High quality piano songs including classic music, anime songs and pop songs.
3. Regular Updates! We will improve Maroon 5 - Girl Like You Piano Tiles with new songs and new features.
4. Endless game with speed increasing

Download Maroon 5 - Girl Like You Piano Tiles for free. This game get you have a good music with beautiful piano songs!
